title: How Black Lives Matter changed the Mideast debate in America
itunes:title: How Black Lives Matter changed the Mideast debate in America
description:
The debate over Middle East policy is changing in the U.S., with more Americans expressing support for Palestinians. The Washington Post and L.A. Times explain the role Black Lives Matter has played in this shift.

Some Republicans who supported Trump’s election falsehoods are now running to become their states’ top election officials. Politico has the story.

Many people who lost restaurant jobs during the economic shutdown have decided to leave the business completely. The Washington Post spoke to industry veterans to find out why.

WABC reports on the first recordings of humpback whales singing off the coast of New York.
